sqls.sql: SELECT ss_tbl1_f1, ss_tbl1_f2, ss_tbl1_f3, ss_tbl1_f4, ss_tbl1_f5, ss_tbl1_f6, ss_tbl1_f7, ss_tbl1_f8, ss_tbl1_f9, ss_tbl1_f10, ss_tbl1_f11, ss_tbl1_f12, ss_tbl1_f13, ss_tbl1_f14, ss_tbl1_f15, ss_tbl1_f16, ss_tbl1_f17, ss_tbl1_f18, ss_tbl1_f19, ss_tbl1_f20, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM ss_tbl1 WHERE ss_tbl1_id = @ss_tbl1_id;
